title: T206 Red Cobb - no longer available
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: T206 Red Cobb - no longer available
posts.post_content:
Card is no longer available.  

Card is very nice and clean with no creases, wrinkles, or paper loss and no flecks that you sometines see in the red background.  I'll offer a money back gaurantee/return privelage if it doesnt grade at least vg/ex as long as the card is returned in the same condition as I sent it out in.  PM me or email me at [url]eangyal@roadrunner.com[/url] if any questions.  Thanks for looking.  

Eric Angyal
